(If answer is Yes, state where and when, whether you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa and whether the visa was issued or refused) Yes E No 36. Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last 12 months? (If answer is Yes, explain) Yes No ti 37. (If answer is Yes, explain) Yes No H ) 39. Do you intend to enter the United States from Canada, Mexico, or an island adjacent to the United States within two years after arrival in Canada, Mexico or such adjacent island?
